full_sentence: Im not sure. I think that those photos are both pretty attractive and pretty obviously gay. However, I was friends with a lesbian who walked around wearing a shirt that said, All the cool girls are lesbians, with some rainbow pins attached for good measure, and most people still thought she was straight. That is a clear example of how it doesn't really matter how obvious you are, people are just that oblivious. You can do it!
